fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Increase your attack power by 1
- (Rehearsing) Attack a player at night, then rehearse.
- (Concert) Deafen a player. When you attack them, you'll bypass protective roles.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- (Rehearsal) You cannot go higher than Overkill attack.
- **Rehearse Radius:** 3
